0.text: Bug 44191  Need better error message for "can't find type".

1.text: I have experienced situations where IAJC outputs a message like this at the  end of compilation.

2.text: [iajc] can't find type org.xxx.SomeTest  In my case this was one time highly confusing since I did not expect the class  in question to be referred anywhere in the project (I have to date still not  located the reference).

3.text: For such cases, it would be extremely nice if the error message would display  WHY it need the class (i.e.

4.text: the name of the refering class(es) or aspect(es)  possibly with a reasonable cutoff as there is seldom need to list all  referals).

5.text: So I would like a message like this:      [iajc] can't find type org.xxx.SomeTest referred by  org.yyy.SomeClass,org.yy.SomeOtherClass ...
